title: The Andromeda Strain

sinopsis: The Andromeda Strain is a thriller about a team of scientists who are investigating a deadly extraterrestrial microorganism that rapidly and fatally clots human blood.

sinopsis: The Venom Business is about a smuggler in Mexico who ships snakes.

sinopsis: This nonfiction book recounts Crichton's experience at Massachusetts General Hospital in Boston in the late 1960s.

sinopsis: Grave Descend is a mystery about a deep sea diver in Jamaica.

author: Michael Douglas

title: Binary
author: John Lange
sinopsis: Binary is about a middle-class small businessman who decides to assassinate the President by stealing an army shipment of the two chemicals that form a deadly nerve agent.

author: Michael Crichton
sinopsis: This book is about the Great Gold Robbery of 1855 and takes place in London.

sinopsis: Eaters of the Dead is about a Muslim in the 10th century who travels with a group of Vikings to their settlement.

title: Congo

sinopsis: Congo is about a diamond expedition in the rain forest of Congo that is attacked by killer gorillas.

title: A Esfera
author: Michael Crichton
sinopsis: Sphere is the story of a psychologist who is called by U.S. Navy to join a team of scientists to examine an enormous spacecraft discovered on the bottom of the Pacific Ocean.

author: Michael Crichton
sinopsis: This nonfiction memoir tells about Crichton's work as a doctor and travels around the world.

sinopsis: Jurassic Park is a science fiction thriller about dinosaurs who are recreated through DNA.

title: Rising Sun
author: Michael Crichton
sinopsis: Rising Sun is about a murder at the Los Angeles headquarters of a Japanese company.

title: Revelação
author: Michael Crichton
sinopsis: Disclosure us about Tom Sanders, who works in a high-tech company just before the beginning of the dot-com economic boom and is wrongly accused of sexual harassment.

title: Armadilha Aérea
author: Michael Crichton
sinopsis: Airframe is about Casey Singleton, a quality assurance vice-president at the fictional aerospace manufacturer Norton Aircraft, who is investigating an accident that left three passengers dead and fifty-six injured.

title: Timeline
author: Michael Crichton
sinopsis: Timeline is about a team of historians who travels to the Middle Ages to retrieve a fellow historian who is trapped there.

title: Prey
author: Michael Crichton
sinopsis: Prey follows a software designer as he is called in to consult on an emergency situation regarding experimental nano-robots.

title: Next
author: Michael Crichton
sinopsis: In Next, Crichton brings up some provocative dilemmas dealing with the topic of genetic testing and ownership.

title: Pirate Latitudes

sinopsis: It is a pirate yarn in the tradition of Treasure Island.

title: Micro
author: Michael Crichton, Richard Preston
sinopsis: A group of graduate students trapped in the Hawaiian rain forest after coming to Hawaii to work for a mysterious Biotech company.
